snippet.title: Kotlin YouTube - Load and Cache Images Picasso (Ep 3)
snippet.description:
Episode 2: https://youtu.be/53BsyxwSBJk

Loading images and caching them in Android can always be a tedious task to perform manually. Luckily we have the help of the open source community to provide us with very useful libraries such as Picasso.  This library has been tried and tested in many production applications so you can put your trust in it.  In today's lesson we configure our app to load images and also flesh out our row items.  Enjoy.

Picasso: http://square.github.io/picasso/
CircleImageView: https://github.com/hdodenhof/CircleImageView

Intermediate Training Core Data
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/course/intermediate-training-core-data

Instagram Firebase Course
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/course/instagram-firebase
